title: Side Bar
description:
The Side Bar is created through the use of a react component called "Collapsible" which can be installed through "npm i react-collapsible". We will use the "Collapsible" as the parent "div" for the unordered list of the side bar menu. 

We will then have access to properties of the component that will allow us to apply conditionals to control the toggle feature. Do take note, this component have to type of "className". The "className" property is for when it is closed whil the "openedClassName" is for when it is opened.

The property "open" accepts a boolean variable to control the opening and closing of the component without any action from the user. 

The "trigger" will act as both the name of the menu list while also being the trigger for the user to click to toggle the menu list. 

The "onOpening" property will trigger when a "trigger" has been clicked. We will toggle the "Collapsible" menu using the "value" of the clicked menu header.

For the menu items inside the "Collapsible" it will be an unordered list that has "OnClick" events.
